message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob. Your turn!
Take 40% and leave me with 60% of the remaining value.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Your turn!
Take 45% and leave me with 55% of the remaining value. You're getting closer to a fair split.
I'm not giving up much more. Let's meet in the middle!
Meet me at 52/48, I'm willing to compromise.
Let's get close to 50/50, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more.
